findings.lower_chest: Mild bibasilar atelectasis; trace bilateral pleural effusions.
findings.abdominal: 2.7 cm left crural ovoid hypodense structure; appendix dilated up to 9 mm and appears hyperemic with surrounding inflammation.
findings.spleen: Normal size and attenuation; 1.1 cm accessory spleen similar to prior.
findings.urinary: Normal symmetric kidneys; innumerable ovoid hypodensities bilaterally.
findings.gastrointestinal: Small bowel normal; diverticulosis in sigmoid colon; rectum with focal wall thickening.
findings.vascular: No abdominal aortic aneurysm; extensive atherosclerotic disease.
findings.bones: No evidence of worrisome osseous lesions.
findings.soft_tissues: Abdominal and pelvic wall within normal limits.

changes_over_time.appendix: Measured 5 mm on prior imaging, now dilated up to 9 mm with increased hyperemia.
changes_over_time.spleen: 1.1 cm accessory spleen similar to prior.
changes_over_time.kidneys: Innumerable ovoid hypodensities bilaterally similar to prior.
